snippet.title: ORBIT Out Now! - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Directed by Marius Solberg

OUT NOW:
▶http://store.steampowered.com/app/348280/
▶https://store.xbox.com/en-GB/Xbox-One/Games/ORBIT/2632de05-fa47-4df1-aae6-a994fdb30c6f

http://orbitgame.com/

Maneuver your ship between planets at breakneck speeds and take gravity into account as you crush your competitors with an epic spaceship arsenal, in this awesome twin-stick spacebrawler! Use special abilities like shields and teleportation to defeat the enemy, and level up between the fights as the madness intensifies! 

ORBIT is developed by 4Bit Games

▶ http://4bitgames.com/


Awards & Recognition

"Winner of game developers competition at TG14" The Gathering, 2014
"Nominated for indie sensation award" Nordic Game, 2014
"Winner of game of the year 2015" Norwegian game awards, 2015
"Winner of gamer's choice" Norwegian game awards, 2015
"Winner of best visual design" Norwegian game awards, 2015
